name: Body Combat
description:
BODYCOMBAT is the empowering cardio workout where you are totally unleashed.
This fiercly energetic programme is inspired by martial arts and draws from a wide
array of disciplines such as karate, boxing, tae kwon do, tai chi and Muay Thai.

Supported by driving music and powerful role model instructors, strike, punch, kick
and kata your way through calories to superior cardio fitness.

name: Total Fitness
description: If you think youre fit, then think again - we dare you to try this class! It uses dynamic exercises and sprints to develop overall fitness. You wont find a class like it anywhere else!

name: Bootcamp
description:
Bootcamp
Our bootcamp-style class will target all
aspects of fitness, including an array
of innovative training methods such
as speed & agility drills, TRX and body
weight exercises. Start the day in style!

name: Body Combat
description: BODYCOMBAT is the empowering cardio workout where you are totally unleashed. This fiercely energetic programme is inspired by martial arts and draws from a wide array of disciplines such as Karate, Boxing, Tae Kwon Do, Tai Chi and Muay Thai. Supported by driving music and powerful role model instructors, strike, punch, kick and kata your way through calories to superior cardio fi tness.

name: Studio Cycling Blast
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. A half hour Blast!

name: Studio Cycling
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. Classes include a
moderately demanding 45 minutes, a
high energy 60 minutes, a Plus class
with added abdominal conditioning and
half hour Blasts!

name: Studio Cycling
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. Classes include a
moderately demanding 45 minutes, a
high energy 60 minutes, a Plus class
with added abdominal conditioning and
half hour Blasts!

name: TRXpress
description:
TRX is an innovative suspension training system, using exercises that can easily be tailored to your ability and providing a whole-body workout.

TRX gives participants an edge over conventional strength training by building true functional strength and by improving flexibility, balance and core stability.

New to TRX training? please arrive
10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Aqua Circuits
description:
This fun class involves a series of conditioning exercises working
with different equipment in the pool to tone muscles and help with weight loss.

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Fitness Yoga
description: This calss uses the postures and stretches of yoga in a group exercise format to develop strength, stability and flexibility.

name: Body Combat
description:
BODYCOMBAT is the empowering cardio workout where you are totally unleashed.
This fiercly energetic programme is inspired by martial arts and draws from a wide
array of disciplines such as karate, boxing, tae kwon do, tai chi and Muay Thai.

Supported by driving music and powerful role model instructors, strike, punch, kick
and kata your way through calories to superior cardio fitness.

name: Yoga
description: Everyone is welcome at this drop-in yoga class for all ages and abilities - a traditional, enjoyable style which incorporates stress release, coordination and balance technique.

name: Body Attack
description: BODYATTACK is the sports-inspired cardio workout for building strength and stamina. This high-energy interval training class combines athletic aerobic movements with strength and stabilization exercises. Dynamic instructors and powerful music motivate everyone towards their fitness goals - from the weekend athlete to the hard-core competitor!

name: Evergreens Table Tennis
description:
EVERGREENS
CLASSES (over 60s)
Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the first time or returning following injury.
We offer Exercise to Music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; Swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: Evergreens Table Tennis
description:
EVERGREENS
CLASSES (over 60s)
Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the first time or returning following injury.
We offer Exercise to Music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; Swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: Cardiac Rehab
description:
Cardiac Rehab
British Association for Cardiovascular
Prevention and Rehabilitation (BACPR)
Accredited Phase IV cardiac rehabilitation
class for long-term management of
individuals with heart disease.

name: Cardiac Rehab
description:

name: Well-being Exercise
description:
Well-being Circuit
A feel-good circuit class for those aged 35 years and over.

name: Well-being Exercise
description:
Well-being Circuit
A feel-good circuit class for over 35 year olds.

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Body Balance
description:
BODYBALANCE is the Yoga, Tai Chi, Pilates workout that builds flexibility and strength and leaves you feeling centered and calm.
Controlled breathing, concentration and a carefully structured series of stretches, moves and poses to music create a holistic workout that brings the body into a state of harmony and balance.

name: Zumba Gold
description: Specifically tailored for the older participant, or those starting a new exercise programme - Zesty Latin music combines with easy-to-follow moves in this fun and friendly class.

name: Evergreens Exercise
description:
EVERGREENS
CLASSES (over 60s)
Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the first time or returning following injury.
We offer Exercise to Music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; Swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: Evergreens Exercise
description:
EVERGREENS
CLASSES (over 60s)
Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the first time or returning following injury.
We offer Exercise to Music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; Swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: Evergreens Fitness Pilates
description: Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the fi rst time or returning following injury. We offer Exercise to music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: HIT
description: 30 minute varied high intensity interval style class.  Both bodyweight and equipment will be used to push your body to the limit.  No class will be the same ensuring that your body will continue to adapt and HIT new levels of fitness.

name: Evergreens Swimming
description:
EVERGREENS
CLASSES (over 60s)
Our popular Evergreens classes are for the over 60s, or individuals beginning exercise for the first time or returning following injury.
We offer Exercise to Music; Fitness Pilates; Aqua Fun; Swimming; Table Tennis & Zumba Gold.

name: Bokwa Fitness
description: The new group fitness programme that is taking the UK by storm! No counting steps, no tricky choreography  just steps based on the forms of letters and numbers giving you a fun and infectious workout!

name: Body Balance
description: BODYBALANCE is the Yoga, Tai Chi, Pilates workout that builds fl exibility and strength and leaves you feeling centered and calm. Controlled breathing, concentration and a carefully structured series of stretches, moves and poses to music create a holistic workout that brings the body into a state of harmony and balance.

name: Body Combat
description:
BODYCOMBAT is the empowering cardio workout where you are totally unleashed.
This fiercly energetic programme is inspired by martial arts and draws from a wide
array of disciplines such as karate, boxing, tae kwon do, tai chi and Muay Thai.

Supported by driving music and powerful role model instructors, strike, punch, kick

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Aqua Aerobics
description: Aqua Aerobics is a high energy and fun fitness class in which you perform a range of aerobic moves in the pool shown to you by our motivational instructors!

name: Aqua Aerobics
description: Aqua Aerobics is a high energy and fun fitness class in which you perform a range of aerobic moves in the pool shown to you by our motivational instructors!

name: Totally Terrified
description: For all who are afraid of the class studio but would really like to give it a go! Build your confidence with one of our beginners classes covering a variety of styles sure to get you ready for our regular classes! Classes will range from basic aerobics to core and boxfit to studio cycling.

name: Evergreens Aquafun
description: A fantastic water based aerobics class designed to challenge you without the added pressure on your joints!

name: Aqua Zumba
description: Splash your way into shape with an invigorating low-impact aquatic exercise. Known as the Zumba "pool party," the Aqua Zumba program gives new meaning to the idea of a refreshing workout. Integrating the Zumba philosophy with traditional aquatic fitness disciplines, Aqua Zumba blends it all together into workout that's cardio-conditioning, body-toning, and most of all, exhilarating beyond belief.

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Studio Cycling
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. Classes include a
moderately demanding 45 minutes, a
high energy 60 minutes, a Plus class
with added abdominal conditioning and
half hour Blasts!

name: Studio Cycling Plus
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. A moderately demanding 45 minutes Plus class with added abdominal conditioning.

name: Step
description:
Creative moves, choreographed around
the step, for an effective fat-burning
and toning workout. Lunchtime 40 minute energy blast.

name: BLT
description:
A pure conditioning class with effective
exercises which target the Bums, Legs
and Tums. Choose from our 40 minute
workout, or 30 minute blast class.

name: Stability Fit
description: Treat yourself to a workout challenge with this dynamic, equipment-based conditioning class. Target movement stability, strength, agility and core awareness, all in one effective 40 minute programme!

name: TRX: Core
description:
TRX is an innovative suspension training system, using exercises that can easily be tailored to your ability and providing a whole-body workout.

TRX gives participants an edge over conventional strength training by building true functional strength and by improving flexibility, balance and core stability.

New to TRX training? please arrive
10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: BLT Blast
description:
A pure conditioning class with effective
exercises which target the Bums, Legs
and Tums. 30 minute blast class.

name: Zumba
description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Synrgy360 Circuits
description: Located within the Energy Zone fitness suite, the Synrgy360 is what some people are calling an Adults Playground! This brand new functional circuit based class will get you pushing, pulling, running and jumping and is focused on improving strength, endurance, agility and toning.

name: Learn-to-TRX
description:
TRX is an innovative suspension training system, using exercises that can easily be tailored to your ability and providing a whole-body workout.

TRX gives participants an edge over conventional strength training by building true functional strength and by improving flexibility, balance and core stability.

New to TRX training? please arrive
10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: TRX Fitness
description:
TRX is an innovative suspension training system, using exercises that can easily be tailored to your ability and providing a whole-body workout.

TRX gives participants an edge over conventional strength training by building true functional strength and by improving flexibility, balance and core stability.

New to TRX training? please arrive
10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Yoga
description: Everyone is welcome at this drop-in yoga class for all ages and abilities - a traditional, enjoyable style which incorporates stress release, coordination and balance technique.

name: Circuits
description: Join us for a traditional circuit but with plenty of new exercises, giving a balanced whole body workout with both CV and resistance exercises. Suitable for all levels to enable you to challenge yourself each week to work to your optimum!

name: Fitness Test
description: Varied fitness test for the estimation of maximal oxygen uptake; core strength and explosive leg power.  Particularly good for those undertaking job specific fitness testing or those looking to develop their sports performance.

name: Zumba
description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Zumba
description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Stretching Workshop
description: A 40 minute workshop focusing on the oft-neglected stretching & flexibility aspect of fitness. Improve your posture, boost your recovery, prevent injury and enhance your performance!

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Body Balance
description: BODYBALANCE is the Yoga, Tai Chi, Pilates workout that builds fl exibility and strength and leaves you feeling centered and calm. Controlled breathing, concentration and a carefully structured series of stretches, moves and poses to music create a holistic workout that brings the body into a state of harmony and balance.

name: Ultimate Abs
description:
A 30 minute focus on the abdominals,
introducing effective exercises to give
you maximum core stability.

name: TRXpress
description:
TRX is an innovative suspension training system, using exercises that can easily be tailored to your ability and providing a whole-body workout.

TRX gives participants an edge over conventional strength training by building true functional strength and by improving flexibility, balance and core stability.

New to TRX training? please arrive
10 minutes prior to the start of your first
class for an initial familiarisation session.

name: Studio Cycling
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. Classes include a
moderately demanding 45 minutes, a
high energy 60 minutes, a Plus class
with added abdominal conditioning and
half hour Blasts!

name: Kettlebells
description: A class that will help to push your fitness goals in the right direction. A combination of strength and endurance to guarantee you sweat, improve all aspects of fitness and get the workout you deserve!

name: Otago (Strength & Balance)
description:
Otago (Strength & Balance)
This unique strength and balance programme was devised from extensive research at Otago University, New Zealand, and has been very successful in building confi dence and reducing falls in the older adult.

name: Studio Cycling Blast
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. A half hour Blast!

description: Join us for a traditional circuit but with plenty of new exercises, giving a balanced whole body workout with both CV and resistance exercises. Suitable for all levels to enable you to challenge yourself each week to work to your optimum!

name: Yoga
description:
Bookable course
Come along to this traditional style yoga aimed at maximising each individual's physical capabilities, with lots of fun! Incorporates stress release, co-ordination, balance techniques and partner work.

These progressive, specialised courses need to be booked in advanced.  

They are not included as part of an ASV Membership.

Members are entitled to discounts on the course fee.

description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Sports Conditioning
description: The ultimate athletic workout! A unique class with serious results! This high intensity workout for athletes and games players will undoubtedly improve your performance. It will hurt... but its worth it!

name: Body Pump
description:
BODYPUMP is the original barbell class that strengthens your entire body. This
workout challenges all your major muscle groups by using the best weight-room
exercises such as squats, presses, lifts and curls. Great music, awesome instructors and your choice of weight inspire you to get the results you came for and fast!

New to BODYPUMP? - please arrive 10 minutes prior to the start of your first

name: Zumba
description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Boxfit
description: Punch your way to a perfect physique. This knock-out session combines boxing movements and circuit exercises for a great workout and stress-buster. Youll be hooked for sure!

name: Step
description:
Creative moves, choreographed around
the step, for an effective fat-burning
and toning workout.

name: Total Fitness
description: If you think youre fit, then think again - we dare you to try this class! It uses dynamic exercises and sprints to develop overall fitness. You wont find a class like it anywhere else!

name: Jog Scotland
description:
Dont put it off!  improve your race time and make new friends with our new Jog Scotland classes! The group will take various routes around Aberdeen including; to the coast, the running track, through Seaton park, and even up Broad Hill!
 
Jogging in a group is a great way to get motivated, gain a sense of achievement and meet new people. increased health and longevity. 
 

These progressive, specialised courses need to be booked in advanced.  

They are not included as part of an ASV Membership.

Members are entitled to discounts on the course fee.

name: Zumba
description: Party yourself into shape with the Latin inspired, easy-to-follow, calorie-burning, dance fitness party. Feel the music and let loose!

name: Adult Badminton
description: Dust off your racquet and let our badminton coaches put you through your paces to help improve your badminton skills and overall fitness using a mixture of effective drills and mini matches  for absolutely ALL levels!

name: Body Attack
description: BODYATTACK is the sports-inspired cardio workout for building strength and stamina. This high-energy interval training class combines athletic aerobic movements with strength and stabilization exercises. Dynamic instructors and powerful music motivate everyone towards their fitness goals - from the weekend athlete to the hard-core competitor!

name: Fitness Yoga
description: This calss uses the postures and stretches of yoga in a group exercise format to develop strength, stability and flexibility.

name: Studio Cycling
description:
Cycle your way to improved aerobic
fitness, and toned muscles throughout
the lower body. Classes include a
moderately demanding 45 minutes, a
high energy 60 minutes, a Plus class
with added abdominal conditioning and
half hour Blasts!

name: Body Combat
description:
BODYCOMBAT is the empowering cardio workout where you are totally unleashed.
This fiercly energetic programme is inspired by martial arts and draws from a wide
array of disciplines such as karate, boxing, tae kwon do, tai chi and Muay Thai.

Supported by driving music and powerful role model instructors, strike, punch, kick
and kata your way through calories to superior cardio fitness.

name: HIT
description: 30 minute varied high intensity interval style class.  Both bodyweight and equipment will be used to push your body to the limit.  No class will be the same ensuring that your body will continue to adapt and HIT new levels of fitness.

name: SH'BAM
description:
SH'BAM is the perfect way to shape up and let out your inner star - even if you're dance challenged.

Set to a soundtrack of chart-topping popular hits, dance music that is heard in the hottest nightclubs around the world, familiar classics remixed and modernized Latin beats, SH'BAM is the ultimate fun and sociable way to exercise. Each 45-minute SH'BAM class is vibrant, unique and varied - and like all the LES MILLS programs, a new SH'BAM release is produced every three months with new music and choreography.
